title: [黃婆婆最新消息] 深圳取保候審

replies.msg:
咩事

《英國旗王婆婆今天對香港人說的話》

總在抗爭街頭舉著英國旗的王婆婆，已失蹤三個多月，大家也非常擔心。

今天她有以下說話對香港人說：

「今天是期待已久的重大日子
體驗民主

因於深圳取保候審
粉碎了心坎
手上一票
化作廢紙一片

還望閣下代本人加油
包括監票留守

All the Best!!! Be Safe!!!」

———

Hong Kong pro-democracy artist and advocate Alexandra Wong was detained in Shenzhen in August. A message from her today:

“Today is the day that we are longing for. A day to witness the realization of democracy.

Because I was detained in shenzhen, my ballot has become a wasted paper. This breaks my heart. Please help add oil for me and vote.

All the Best!!! Be Safe!!!”
